title: The Trapped Girls Collection: Detective Grant Abduction Mysteries
description: Mystery mastermind James Hunt brings you the newest collection of the highly-rated "Detective Grant Abduction" Series. These stories have accumulated over 150+ five-star reviews and have been boxed together for the first time! The Silent Ones (Books 1,2,3) A retired detective must solve a string of child abductions before it’s too late One morning. One note. Three Ten years ago, former Seattle Police Detective Chase Grant assisted on a homicide case that led to the capture and imprisonment of one of the country’s deadliest serial killers. But even behind bars Dennis Pullman is still wreaking havoc. Missing Person (Books 1,2,3) With a family missing, and after four years off the police force, Chase Grant finds himself back in the midst of a criminal investigation. But as he teams up with the FBI and the U.S. Marshals working this high-profile case, Grant will be forced to confront a past that he thought he was prepared to deal with, but if he can't overcome his memories, then it could mean the end of a missing family.
author: James  Hunt
